fullText: The Outsiders succeeds in translating S.E. Hinton's beloved novel into a musical that feels both faithful to its source material and wholly theatrical.
dtliExcerpt: The Outsiders succeeds in translating S.E. Hinton's beloved novel into a musical that feels both faithful to its source material and wholly theatrical.
